title: Mike-miner
author: Mike-miner
content: SCAM website clooned the original one. They will contact you by email to advertise on their website....payment crypto.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You should create a proper scam accusation report and clearly indicate the difference between the original site and the clone site. This will help for future reference, especially for people who will end up in this thread after a Google search.For example;OriginalQuoteDomain: asicminervalue.comRegistrar: OVH sasRegistered On: 2017-12-12Expires On: 2022-12-12Updated On: 2021-12-01CloneQuoteDomain: asicminersvalue.comRegistrar: CloudFlare, Inc.Registered On: 2022-01-05Expires On: 2023-01-05Updated On: 2022-01-14You should also indicate maybe through a screenshot how they tried to contact you. This will be helpful to other users.

comments.author: smooki3
comments.body: I took a look and compared the list of vendors in both websites and saw that these websites aren't in the real asicminervalue, but are in the fake one:cryptosupply.de5111.storebitshopusa.comgalaxy-miners.comminersdeals.commyrig.comProbably the guys behind the fake one will try to deceive people, including their scam website in it and when you want proof for legitimacy, the link from the fake asicminervalue will be sent to the non-suspecting person who wants to order, and it's all done. The trap is set and they will wait for their prey.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: smooki3 on May 23, 2022, 01:55:10 PMI took a look and compared the list of vendors in both websites and saw that these websites aren't in the real asicminervalue, but are in the fake one:cryptosupply.de5111.storebitshopusa.comgalaxy-miners.comminersdeals.commyrig.comProbably the guys behind the fake one will try to deceive people, including their scam website in it and when you want proof for legitimacy, the link from the fake asicminervalue will be sent to the non-suspecting person who wants to order, and it's all done. The trap is set and they will wait for their preyNice catch. You are right.I used to see this kind of practice mostly with scam Bitcoin mixers where the scammers would create a review article, but it would be full of only scam or clone Bitcoin mixers created by them

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Mike-miner on May 20, 2022, 11:38:35 AM SCAM website clooned the original one. They will contact you by email to advertise on their website....payment crypto. If they've given you an address, please report it to the following websites: bitcoinabuse and scam-alertI'm glad they didn't use NameCheap [shouldn't take long to take them down (hopefully)]:Code:Registrar Abuse Contact Email: registrar-abuse@cloudflare.comRegistrar Abuse Contact Phone: +1.4153197517Quote from: smooki3 on May 23, 2022, 01:55:10 PMI took a look and compared the list of vendors in both websites and saw that these websites aren't in the real asicminervalue, but are in the fake one:~Snipped~Previously, all of these websites were also in the original one [proof], but for some reason that's no longer the case [in other words, the fake one (asicminersvalue) forgot to update their list (archived) ]!
